startsteps.title: Send application
startsteps.body: First, you have to send us an application in which you fill in your details, for example the car's registration number and your personal details.

startsteps.title: Wait for the answer
startsteps.body: After your application has been approved, your car will become available for sale to dealers. You will receive a message from us when this happens

startsteps.title: Your car is sold!
startsteps.body: Congratulations! When the auction is over and the dealer is ready to buy the car, we will contact you
